title: Spatulas in Carousel
body: I am glad that Spatulas are removed from the first Carousel as I think that was pretty OP, but I don't think they should be removed from Carousels entirely.  They added a really interesting dimension to the game, so making them 100% chance is kind of a bummer in my book.

replies.body: ya exactly now low easy build can win easy now the game is so dead to me 2 now
